name: Mexican Spinach Casserole Deluxe
ingredients: 1 pound ground beef, pork or turkey
10 ounce package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well-drained
10 ounce can Ro-tel tomatoes, drained (diced tomatoes with green chiles)
2 roasted red bell peppers, coarsely chopped
4 ounces mozzarella or Monterey Jack cheese, shredded, 1 cup

instructions.en: Brown the meat and onion; drain the fat.
Blend in the cream cheese until completely incorporated.
Put all ingredients in a greased 2 1/2-quart casserole and mix well.
Bake at 350º for about 40 minutes or until bubbly and browned on top.

notes: Makes 6-8 servings. Can be frozen. Seasoning for Tacos is assumed to be a separate recipe.
